```{r}
prices = read.csv("../global_idx_close_price.csv")
prices = na.omit(prices)
shape = dim(prices)
dates = prices[,1]
symbols = names(prices)[2:shape[2]]
values = as.matrix(prices)
colMeans(values)
```
